website_summaries.verdict: These rugged binoculars work well in all light conditions and can stand up against any type of bad weather.
pros: Can be used with a tripod
Twist-up eye cups are comfortable for use with eyeglasses
Good image quality, even in low light
cons: Some users have said that it's difficult to precisely focus these binoculars

customer_reviews.title: Many adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Well made binoculars, Just need to constantly be adjusting them to get a clear image. They will not hold the corrections. and you end up really having to moneky around with them alot. These were not a good buy for any kind of quick acquisition or spotting. You have to hunt for the picture and constantly handle them with white gloves despite the durable rubber coating. The was my first Celestron pair.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So we ordered four different brands that had been highly rated all within the same price range. These were about $40 cheaper than the other three sets. Four of us looked through them and all four of us ranked these as the 2nd best in clarity and 3rd in eye relief. Due to their small size and lower price, these were the pair we decided to keep. These are a great value and worth consideration. The one pair that had the best eye relief and clarity was the slightly more expensive Nikons Aculons. The Nikons one problem was their size and weight, being a tad too big and heavy for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So I don't have $250-400 to spend on a pair of binoculars for hunting. This pair so far is GREAT! They are easy to focus, have great magnification and are sturdy. We'll see how they do for elk hunting, but so far, these are the best value and quality of binoculars I have ever owned. 11/5/17 Update: Took this elk hunting this weekend for 5 days. This allowed me to glass for hours in 32 degree rain, snow, fog and low light conditions with no issues. Great binoculars, I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Strider

customer_reviews.title: No matter what adjustments I made the binoculars displayed a ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter what adjustments I made the binoculars displayed a double image... Unit looks solidly constructed & as such I'm returning it for a replacement and will update this feedback when the replacement unit arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Godzilla Breath

customer_reviews.title: Best binocs I've bought
customer_reviews.text: I may have looked through better glasses, but these are killer for the low price. I have a pair of 10 x 28 small portable Vivatar's that would fit almost in one hand...the Celestron's larger objective really does improve the view quite a bit; and I would judge at not a great penalty in increased size or weight when hiking/camping. At this time they completely meet my needs for scoping/scouting at a price I can deal with.
customer_reviews.author: gonzeaux

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong purchasing Celestron binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 different binoculars to compare ease of focusing, clarity of optics, quality of build. These Celestron Outland 10x42 binoculars surpassed them all while being in the middle of the price range. These will be my go to units with bird watching, camping etc. The clarity of focus is excellent. Packaging was quality. The feel is stable and the image is easy to stabilize. Right out of the box I was able to zero in on a target 200 yards away and read sign print.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get focus no matter what we did, just saw blurry images
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly at all, maybe product was faulty. i own two other makes and this was by far the worse i have ever tried. fox was in field took me too long to focus to see him and gone. worked 5 mins with them. got the old pair and saw him the next day in a matter of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Etta Ptake

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering a 49$ pair of binocs. I hunt and realize the importance of optics. I typically spend more on my scopes than my rifles. So when I needed some glass for a hunting trip in a wide open area (something Im not used to here in western washington) I decided to grab these for a "one time use" situation, but rest assured these are amazing optics for the price. As good or better than the entry level nikons, leupolds, vortex, etc. If you need some everyday bang around optics, these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan T Steed

customer_reviews.title: Broken and waiting since 5/31/2020 for a warranty replacement. It is now 9/17/2020
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable eye cups on both eyes on my Outland X binoculars broke within a few days of each other. There was no impact damage or abuse. The ratcheting system that holds them in position broke rendering the binoculars useless. I had to super glue them in position as seen in the photo. I contacted Celestron on 5/31/2020, and after many emails all initiated by myself, they claim they are out of stock due to the Covid-19 pandemic, I have still not received the replacement they agreed to send as of today 9/17/2020. Do yourself a favor, and purchase from a reputable company that backs their warranty commitment.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, from an Amateur.
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I'm new to binoculars so I know nothing. That said, these are great. I can clearly see traffic light street signs 3/4 - 1 mile away. The picture is a little shaky but I suppose that's on the user. They are rubberized and feel solid so they can take a bump or two. They are completely adjustable to fit snugly over your eyes whether your eyes are too close to your nose or too close to your ears, or if you're Forest Whitaker. For $60, I'd say it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anubis Magana

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Read the instruction manual before using these. Once you do that, you will love these. The right eye diopter focuser wheel thing is tight for a reason. It keeps the focus turned in just for you. If anyone else uses they, they can focus it in for themselves. I can focus in wearing my progressive lens glasses or contacts. My eyesight is too bad to use without them. I have used these Binoculars daily since they arrived. Birding, watching little league games, and keeping track of the kids on their skijets at the lake. These are well worth the price, which won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible for the price! These Binos are the perfect balance between portability and power. I've used binos that are 5x this in price and I have to attest, the difference in negligible. This would be great for wildlife watching, hunting, safety surveillance, and all else that would require magnified viewing. The adjustable eye cups, focus, spread, clarity and build are spot on for a "cheap" pair of 10x42 binos! They are NOT however weather sealed. So constant exposure to wet conditions could be damaging.
customer_reviews.author: Infinite-T Digital

customer_reviews.title: overall value
customer_reviews.text: Incredible image, this is my first step up from unknown brands and paying cheaper prices, well i should have just left the lower priced ones for children, id been wasting my time. I use for boating n hiking casual use, i could have bought more expensive model but it would have been money just sitting there Im very satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Clear, lightweight, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for sightseeing in central america (about half of the Costa Rican tour guides I met had them too) as well as wildlife viewing and big game hunting across much of the western U.S. No problems with fogging or distortion in rain or cold, super clear views, good FOV, a great all-around choice. There are more expensive glasses out there, but they are not enough better than these to justify the extra cost. These are awesome binoculars and an unbeatable value.
customer_reviews.author: Al Bacone

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for bird watching!
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of research and found that the Celestron Nature DX was touted as a best in class ($110), then I found the Outland priced at $50! The differences were negligible and I’m so happy I saved $60! I can see the birds at the feeder, I can even see large birds up on the high tension poles. I haven’t tried them on the river yet but I anticipate that they will be pretty good. A great deal and a good pair of binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Good One!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for travel Machu Picchu. We could have very good view for all places we visited! We can clearly see the cemetery on the top of the mountain or on the cliff, and the hole that the Spanish invaders dig for the tomb. Very useful for the travel. The only thing hard for us is that the weight is heavier than what I expected. But compared with the wonderful experience, the weight was okay. We also recommended to other travelers to go to amazon...
customer_reviews.author: DocJL

customer_reviews.title: Mechanism stiff.
customer_reviews.text: The focus rings not really as fluid(movement) as I think they should be . Lotta clicks when trying to use. Stiff adjustments. Granted, might just be this pair. Could be smoother. Minimal use since purchase. Optics are great!
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Celestron outland X Binoculars 10X42
customer_reviews.text: tested my new Celestron outland X Binoculars today, Good distance view and lens quality. Light enough to hold for extended period of time. Easy to focus and clarity is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Black half moons move around edge of viewing area obstructing view
customer_reviews.text: Even though the build quality of these are good, there is something important that should be noted. A half black moon moves around your field of view as you are looking through these, and no matter what I do they will not go away. As another person noted that he wears glasses and they improved slightly on his. I also got an opened box item as I can tell the original seal was broken and someone taped this one back. Maybe I got this persons defective units; i don not know but I have a older celestron c-90 and its going strong to this date
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Very good value!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted a name brand like Nikon or something but they are very expensive so I was unsure of what to do. I have an 8 inch Celestron telescope which has outstanding optical quality so I thought that I would give these a go. I was not disappointed at all. They are wonderful. In fact they are better than I had expected. So clear and easy to use. Also the size 10x42 is a size that one usually has to have a larger sized set but these are very compact. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: teachinggrace

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered 10x50 , that is the magnification of the binoculars that I replaced. They are very clear, Easy to carry and use , just not as strong as I would like.... quality does seem to be good with limited use since I purchased them
customer_reviews.author: Randolph M. Trull

customer_reviews.title: Better than similarly priced competition
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Crisp clear view. Love that all of the lens covers stay attached to the binos. Nitrogen filled, anti fog. Better than my Busnells that are priced the same.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can see clearly
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an amazing deal. Amazon never ceases to amaze me with their prices. Can see real clearly with these binoculars and can adjust for better view. They are slightly heavy. That or I've just gotten weaker. But overall, really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Banda

customer_reviews.title: Nice for bird watching.
customer_reviews.text: These are late and heavy but a nice upgrade from my other 8/32. Larger and heavy but manageable. Use it for bird watching in my backyard. Nice carrying pouch and lens covers, etc. Cannot speak to its water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: WoW! I got this Outland 10x42 binocular to use at the range, camping and hunting. I can see my target hits at 100 yards with no problem. Sharp clear view, easy focus, rugged, well made. Comes with a nice neck strap and case. The case even has it's own strap and a belt loop strap. The front lens caps are separate and attached to each barrel, just flip each one down. The rear lens caps are one piece. I attach one side of the rear cap to the neck strap and it just hangs there while in use. Can't wait to take these hunting and camping.
customer_reviews.author: J.Carpy75

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazed. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on the reviews which I’m starting to become skeptical on much of amazon but these things blew me away. The clarity is phenomenal. They say u got to spend the money for nice roof prisims, but I’m more than pleased with these. The only thing you might get with higher end is seeing better in low light conditions. These are $200 binoculars for $49
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I used these binoculars for the Formula 1 races. I had very good views of 3 turns but wasn't close enough to the action and the closest TelePrompter was several yards away, it completely useless. With these I could see cars blaze up the straight aways. And the prompter scene was fairly legible when I used it to see current racers position. It really made it a worthwhile experience! Grateful I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 2-3 weeks and thought they were pretty nice, had a good sturdy feel. I left them on the kitchen table so I could play with them occasionally to get more familiar with them since I had never used binoculars before. I would use them for a few minutes and then put the lens caps back on. When I went to use them the other day, I found that where the eye cup adjusts in and out had quit locking in place and would move freely. I don’t know if this is common or a fluke but I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Barbre

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a $200 pair
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine and so far I’m blown away. I will be using these hunting this year and I think they will be perfect. Very clear and seen well built. I wouldn’t hesitate to say these are comparable to some binoculars I’ve used in the $200-$300 range. If anything Changes I’ll update my review but as of now I’d give these 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: B Truss

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase!!! I am a naturalist and really getting into birding. I had a pair of Bushnell 10X25 for the last ten years but they weren't making it for birding. I spent today out using these binocs and am s happy with them. They have a very crisp and clear view and are easy to adjust the sight quickly. They are perfect for people with smaller faces and narrow set eyes. My only complaint would be the rubber eyepiece rings are pretty large and bang into my nose. If you have an ample bridge on your nose these may not work very well. Overall a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: in_side_out79

customer_reviews.title: great for everything
customer_reviews.text: i got them for birdwatching at the beach and fields. also great for moon watching. easy to focus, easy to carry and a good size with big power. can't go wrong with celestron.
customer_reviews.author: DLN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Crystal clear, waterproof, I've banged them up a bit and they are fine. I'm always amazed by how sharp the image is with these, especially considering the price! I tested binoculars that cost twice as much in the stores and they were no better. They feel very sturdy and well made, I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dantzler

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value and performance!
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are simply amazing, especially for this price. I use binoculars in my work almost daily, and these have become my go to set. They are solidly built, and the optics are crystal clear. These binoculars also work better with my glasses then any other pair that I have, or have tried. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a great set of binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice upgrade from our pocket binoculars. Great clear view and easy focus. The power is really nice. No noticable difference between this and a much more expensive version. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H 11813

customer_reviews.title: It is good condition
customer_reviews.text: it is good condition amazon always delete my five stars says Your review of Five stars ... could not be posted to Amazon , so I only give you four stars...
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: These binoculars are great they exceeded all my expectations read many reviews before ...
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are great they exceeded all my expectations read many reviews before buying and I can't rave enough about it. I have been able to go to Central Park and also in the suburban areas of New Jersey and New York to see some magnificent birds with my family
customer_reviews.author: David Palacio

customer_reviews.title: okay for an entry level BUT dont expect too much!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and it is okay for an entry level, BUT there are many issues and thus don’t expect too much (a good quality binocular cost at least twice as much).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Celestron Outland X and birds
customer_reviews.text: Hello I am birdwatcher, I live in coffee region in Colombia, we have many birds, they do very happy us with your colors and songs. I need a binoculars to watch this naturals marvels (birds), I found in my binoculars "Celestron Outland X 10x42" a powerfull tool for to enjoy my hobbie, your quality optic allow to watch birds in all your esplendor. Have a nice day.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Edo Salazar Arias

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Celestron makes a quality product and these binoculars are well made, providing excellent distance and clarity. The case is a bit tight fit but is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carz

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive & solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this during Black Friday Sales for $39.90 The feel and construction of the product is excellent. Optics wise, I am not an expert or owner of several binoculars to provide better comparison with other models. But it's definitely sharp and clear for me. For those having problems viewing with their glasses on. Take them away, you can view perfectly without your glasses. Just play around with the focusing
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Great for bird-watching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and she loved it. Said she can really see the types of birds now with detail. She was very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great clear view. Rubberized coating on binoculars. Seems a little narrow for my eyes but works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: The clarity and sharpness of these binoculars is incredible. Terrific quality. I'm very happy with them. The tripod mount feature is nice, however I haven't tried that feature yet although I did purchase a steel tripod adapter. The required IPD for me brings the barrels of this pair too close together, but I think I might be able to get them mounted on the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: John Falkl

customer_reviews.title: These are my first pair of "real" binoculars and they seem to be very nicely built. A lanyard for the binoculars is included ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these binoculars just for exploring the outdoors and being able to check out trails and wildlife in the distance. These are my first pair of "real" binoculars and they seem to be very nicely built. A lanyard for the binoculars is included as well as a carrying case which has its own lanyard. Images are bright, and the binoculars fit in my hands well.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Personally I prefer vortex for hunting, but for new hunters or someone wanting a introductory pair of binoculars, these are amazing. The company is known for telescopes and their ability to make optics is very well shown. Would recommend for anyone, even if just for a backup pair!
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Used for hunting. Overall great image and build quality, especially for this price. The lens covers are nice. You can unscrew the red logo badge at the front and screw in a tripod adapter for glassing.
customer_reviews.author: L. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars at the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reasonably priced pair of binoculars that I wouldn't care about if they got damaged. Based on other positive reviews I bought these. Great low light performance, nice field of view and the 10x magnification brings me in close to my subjects.
customer_reviews.author: Gear Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice binoculars, especially for the price. I use them daily and am pleased with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Fisher

customer_reviews.title: high Quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot before buying this product, this is my first pair of binoculars, and Im very happy with them, they are powerful with really clear image, easy to use, (they are high quality material made), the only con I find is that are made in china, but this doesn't affect the quality. best deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: alejandro  Arechaederra

customer_reviews.title: really clear
customer_reviews.text: great for backyard bird watching, they are really clear and the zoom was more than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Salado

customer_reviews.title: Very good Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These Binoculars are fantastic for the price. I mainly use them for hunting and scouting for hunting. I also use them for general purposes like bird watching, hiking, and i keep them in the boat when I'm fishing. They're good quality and you can see a long way clearly. I would definitely recommend them for anyone who wants good all around Binoculars for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use at the theatre
customer_reviews.text: I took them to a Broadway play but I felt ridiculous and people around me made me feel very uncomfortable. It seems like it works very well for long distances though.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: oh man the image quality is just awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon for a well packed intact delivery to Australia - I am not an expert on optics, and also this is my first binocular... i researched a lot and decided on this for my first binocular ... came well packed and sealed.. oh man the image quality is just awesome... love seeing birds, distant object and trees.. just great and super value!!! i strongly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Livin Stunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and just the right size. We have about 6 acres we’re looking across and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Bubba's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I use this for bird watching all the time.
customer_reviews.author: grammyb

customer_reviews.title: What a value!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so bright and crisp...esp for the $$ Highly recommend! If you're a little shaky consider the 8x40
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken them out on the trail yet, but have used them to watch wildlife at my house. They seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Reid

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my outdoor/camping supplies.
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my outdoor/camping supplies. The Outland Series was designed to meet the needs of every outdoor enthusiast, and they are - in my opinion- the ideal size for any outdoor activity. The rubber covered Outland X allows for rough and tough handling and the binoculars are waterproof and fogproof and are nitrogen purged for using in all weather environments. The 10x magnification together with the field of view 294 Ft. at 1000 yds. make an incredible combination. Very satisfied with this purchase - great value for the $$$ spent.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye HD Rider

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of binocs. Great for the price. Would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat these for the price
customer_reviews.text: I also bought a cheap Nikon Binocular and the Simmons Prosport, both at 10x42. These have a very noticeable difference in clarity and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Ryan

customer_reviews.title: They are great binoculars for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before a South Africa Safari and we used them constantly! They are great binoculars for the price, easy to focus, and the cap covers protect the lenses when not in use. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Cherian

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and site! Exactly what was expected highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: allissa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. I haven't yet had a chance to use it away from the familiar places, but am really looking forward to it. I think I'll enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: INcatlady

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These fogged up with water the first time I took them in the rain, not at all waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: can't explain it but unobstructed vision isn't possible along the entire adjustment range.
customer_reviews.text: just cant find a way to square them up to my eyes properly - really don't understand it because having owned about 10 different sets of binoculars over the last 40+ years, these ones just don't allow unobstructed vision in any adjustment range. its weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We spent quite awhile looking at comparable binoculars at major sports retail stores.This set was comparable to more expensive brands for quality, easy to use, great focus and a better price on Amazon. The reviews helped us decide on this model. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin21Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great bino!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little suspicious at first because of the price but man these work well. I am in law enforcement in Guantanamo bay Cuba and I use them to identify boats. Very clear view. Comfortable in the hands and on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good price work great
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with how good they are for a low price
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Post

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of binoculars for $50
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of binoculars for $50. I couldn't get a better deal anywhere else. Customized mine with mossy oak vinyl wrap camo to use in the woods for hunting. Looks like I bought it with camo on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Aury Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Binoculars! Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these binoculars for a trip to Canada and Alaska. The provided exceptional clarity and magnification. Images were very crisp. These binoculars worked much better than the ones provided in our cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Binocular!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for its size and price! I very enjoy using this binocular, very great lens and sharp! and very light for handling with one hand!
customer_reviews.author: Babak

customer_reviews.title: Great hunting binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Great hunting binoculars. Small and good for caring while you are walking. If you're wanting a spotting scope this clearly isn't one but great for caring around with you.
customer_reviews.author: Braxton

customer_reviews.title: All the power in the world, but clear lens makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: Perfection perfect nice optics for the price. Thank you for a product that works and looks nice too. And the nice: case, neck strap and lens caps. A sweet package. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James Carollo

customer_reviews.title: Binoculars for watching birds
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes to watch birds and asked me for some binoculars that were over $500.00. I told her no way. I found these with the exact same specs. and they were highly recommended by the pro's. They were about $72.00 bucks. Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for archery
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these. I use them for 3D tournament archery and they're every bit as good as my old Nikon. Very durable and focus extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: jake priest

customer_reviews.title: Weak product.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to focus, but you can not expect much quality for the price. I'll buy other for marine use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mitio Nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great....as far as I can tell just as nice as the $299 pair these appear to be a copy of, that I looked at and tried in a store in person after I already bought and tried these. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good binocular and good magnifying focus
customer_reviews.text: Good binocular and good magnifying focus. I can see the full moon clearly. Also, I saw Mars, Jupiter as a small circle. I saw stars which cannot be seen with eyes such as Thuraya, Orion Nebula, etc... I saw also one times new crescent moon last year. It is a practical binocular for every things.
customer_reviews.author: Aqeel

customer_reviews.title: Very good binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson wanted some binoculars for Christmas, to use when hunting, so I started reading reviews. These sounded good based on other buyers' experience so I ordered them. He's very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Montyloon

customer_reviews.title: Birding in Maine
customer_reviews.text: These were a step up from my 8X set. This is as large a mag. power as I would go for hand held on the fly viewing. Very enjoyable birding this spring before the leaves took over.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our grandson to look for wild game in our timber! He loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Gpa steven and gma theresa

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: We share these binoculars while hiking. We have completely different vision from each other and the focussing range accommodates both of us whether we have glasses on or remove them. Easy to use, not too heavy. Hinged caps on both ends make it less likely to lose them. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Paula Reese

customer_reviews.title: These work perfectly with excellent clarity. The orange logo thing fell off somewhere ...
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly with excellent clarity. The orange logo thing fell off somewhere along the line. I also lost one of the lens covers but that is on me...
customer_reviews.author: NMDD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recreational birdwatching
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for recreational birdwatching! Great crisp view, easy to use, lightweight. The only thing that would make this better is an autofocus, but I would only expect that at a higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beally

customer_reviews.title: Amazon value
customer_reviews.text: The biggest benefit was pricing on Amazon. Looked elsewhere for decent (but not exorbitant) binocs for kids to use while I use mine. Same product elsewhere was significantly more expensive, so a great deal via Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Garth W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice!! Great product at a great price. The view is crystal clear with the Bak-4 prism. Lets lots of light through with crisp detail and wide field of view. Quality seems solid compared to others that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars and perfect for birding
customer_reviews.text: These are Awesome, exactly what I need for the birding I do.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Lets start with the good.sturdy,tripod adaptable, rubberized,easy to focus,nice clear glass,decent price The bad,little on the heavy side,tripod a most for prolonged use. Case and straps are cheap but whatever. Sadly my particular pair came witha blemishs on the inside of the eye lens.cause a half crescent shape in the outer view. Had these binos not been blemised I believe they would be a fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mistake in review
customer_reviews.text: I got this mixed up with the Bushnell. This Celestron is too powerful for concerts and tennis events and does not fit in a bag or tote. I returned the Celestron. Marta
customer_reviews.author: Marta Mountjoy

customer_reviews.title: A Birdwatcher's Binocular
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars are a perfect weight and size for bird watching. Simple adjustments to tune in the scene. Water proof too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K Mink

customer_reviews.title: Small size, great view, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Small size, clear view. I have to use it wide open to match my eyes, and my eyes are not wide set. If your eyes are set more than 2 7/8" center to center, these are not for you. They come with flip up caps on both ends, as well as a neck strap, I like that.
customer_reviews.author: mike little

customer_reviews.title: Very good optics.
customer_reviews.text: Very good optics. Nice quality feel to them. Good binoculars for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to see. I have to angle it just ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to see. I have to angle it just right to get the view. After I got used to it, then it wasn't so bad. So I think it is fair to give a rating of 4 considered the price you pay for it, you get good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: cuphea

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality and it's made in the US ...
customer_reviews.text: Very clear, sharp focus. Not too heavy. Really seems to reduce glare. Very happy with the quality and it's made in the US too.
customer_reviews.author: E LEV

customer_reviews.title: usually trees and brush can be pretty thick but these do an excellent job in these ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the Celestron Outland binoculars for hunter in South Georgia woods, usually trees and brush can be pretty thick but these do an excellent job in these conditions as well as in open country. Very pleased with their performace.
customer_reviews.author: tango

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, reasonably compact, works well. Comes with rubber dust covers for the lenses but no attachments on the from ones, so you will probably lose them rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice & lightweight binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are probably a stronger magnify than I really need, but they are nice. I have a tripod that helps. I'm betting they are going to be great to star gaze with
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT!!!! I've never liked binocs because of their fuzzy focus, fogging, and weird eye cups, but as a field biologist, they are a necessity. After destroying a pair of bushnells and giving up on a few other pairs, I saw these on sale and took a chance. Holy moly am I glad I did! They have adjustable eyecups, focus well, can be used at dusk, hold their distance adjustment, are packaged well, and are not too heavy or bulky. I've used them in the rain/fog with success as well. The strap sucks but nobody's perfect. I highly recommend these and am SO glad to have found them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ive had mine for almost 2 years now and have used them for several different purposes and I must say that I love them. No issues what so ever and would recommend and buy again. These are great quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Zannworks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, except for the right eye fine tuning.. it is very hard to turn. I worked on it thinking it would loosen up, but it did not. I don't no if it is defective or not? I like the size, and for my purposes it does just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

product_meta.title: Celestron – Outland X 10x42 Binoculars – Waterproof & Fogproof – Binoculars for Adults – Multi-Coated Optics and BaK-4 Prisms – Protective Rubber Armoring
product_meta.description:
Style:10x42| Configuration:BinocularCelestron's mid-sized Outland X Series was designed to meet the needs of every outdoor enthusiast. Multi-coated optics help obtain the highest resolution and contrast views, while the prisms made of BaK-4 glass provide you with sharp and enhanced color fidelity for an exceptional viewing experience. A protected rubber-coated exterior allows for rough and tough handling in all-weather environments, as it provides extra protection from outdoor elements as well as a secure, anti-slip gripping surface. Your Outland X binoculars will last for years to come! Comfortable straps have been pre-attached to the binoculars for easy ready-to-go use, and the objective lens covers are semi-attached so they don't get lost. Tripod adapter threads are also included in case you’d like to attach your binocular to an adapter and tripod (sold separately) for extended viewing sessions. All in all, this binocular offers a lightweight, ergonomic form factor designed for maximum comfort. The Outland X is a great birdwatching binocular for adults. Our binoculars include a wide, comfortable binocular strap and a soft, moisture-resistant neoprene carrying case. Buy with confidence from the world’s #1 telescope brand and a leading sport optics manufacturer, based in California since 1960. You’ll also receive a Limited Lifetime warranty and unlimited access to technical support from our team of US-based experts. Enjoy your new Celestron Outland X binoculars!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 Outland X 10x42 Binocular (item #71347) 

OUTLAND X 10X42 BINOCULAR

Item #71347  * Overview
 * Details
 * Specs

OVERVIEW
Outland X 10x42 - General Features  * Multi-Coated Optics
 * Waterproof and Fogproof
 * Protective Rubber Covering
 * Twist-up Eyecups for Quick Adjustment
 * Moisture Resistant Neoprene Carrying Case
 * No Fault Lifetime Warranty

DETAILS
See the outdoors in a whole new way! 

Celestron's mid-size Outland Series was designed to meet the needs of every outdoor enthusiast, from birders and hunters to sports fans to travelers. The optics are multi-coated to obtain high resolution and high contrast views. The prism are made of BaK-4 glass to give you enhanced color fidelity. 

The rubber covered Outland X allows for rough and tough handling and the binoculars are waterproof and fogproof and are nitrogen purged for using in all weather environments. Large focus knobs make for easy and precise focusing and twist-up eyecups allow for quick adjustment of eye relief to obtain the full field of view. 

Comfortable traps are pre-attached to the binoculars to make them ready to use. The objective lens covers are semi-attached so they don't get lost on the 42mm sizes. Tripod adapter threads are included on the 42mm sizes. All of the above items come in a lightweight, ergonomic design for maximum comfort. 

The Outland X is available in four sizes and includes a wide binocular strap, soft protective carry pouch and a No-Fault Lifetime Warranty. The Outland X is a versatile binocular and a superb value, making it the ideal choice for all of your outdoor adventures! 

SPECS
 * Optical Design: Roof 
 * Diameter: 42 mm (1.65 in) 
 * Magnification: 10 x 
 * Angular Field of View: 5.6 ° 
 * Linear Field of View (@1000 yds): 293 ft (89.31 m) 
 * Linear Field of View (@1000 m): 97.7 m (320.54 ft) 
 * Exit Pupil: 4.2 mm (0.17 in) 
 * Eye Relief: 14 mm (0.55 in) 
 * IPD Min: 56 mm (2.2 in) 
 * IPD Max: 74 mm (2.91 in) 
 * Near Focus (Binoculars): 13 ft (3.96 m) 
 * Prisms: BaK-4 
 * Optical Coatings: Multi-Coated 
 * Weather Proof: Waterproof 
 * Weight: 22 oz (623.69 g)
feature_bullets: MULTI-COATED OPTICS AND BaK-4 PRISMS: Multi-coated optics help obtain high resolution and high contrast views, while the prisms made of BaK-4 glass will give you enhanced color fidelity. Enjoy crisp, detailed views and dependable performance with our Outland X all-around binocular

WATERPROOF AND FOGPROOF: Designed to withstand all weather conditions, our Outland X compact binoculars have been filled and sealed with dry nitrogen gas for rigorous outdoor use without internal fogging of the lenses

PROTECTIVE RUBBER COVERING: Our binocular is both durable and well-armored; its rugged exterior ensures protection from all outdoor elements while providing a secure, anti-slip gripping surface. The Outland X is also a great birdwatching binocular

TWIST-UP EYECUPS FOR QUICK ADJUSTMENT: Large focus knobs make for easy and precise focusing, and twist-up eyecups allow for quick adjustment of eye relief to obtain a full field of view. Eyecups can be easily positioned for use with or without eyeglasses

UNBEATABLE WARRANTY AND CUSTOMER SUPPORT: Buy with confidence from the world’s #1 telescope brand and a leading sport optics manufacturer, based in California since 1960. You’ll also receive a Limited Lifetime warranty and unlimited access to technical support from our team of US-based experts.
